title: Bloomberg Pro Tips: Visualize company trends with GF
content:
This episode of Bloomberg Pro Tips shows how, by using the GF tool on the Bloomberg Terminal, you can graph segment data, KPIs, and fundamentals in a customizable view, and build custom spreads and ratios for deeper analysis to spot company trends.
